meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I windsurfed on the lake.
meanings.sent2: She windsurfed every summer at the beach.
meanings.sent3: The cat windsurfed on the cardboard box, pretending it was the ocean.
meanings.sent4: His words windsurfed through the room, reaching every ear.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sail windsurfed gracefully in the wind, a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Windsurfed: participated in the sport of windsurfing
meanings.sent1: Last weekend, we windsurfed together for the first time.
meanings.sent2: They windsurfed competitively in the championship.
meanings.sent3: The penguin windsurfed on the icy waves, impressing the other animals.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter windsurfed across the beach, contagious and joyful.
meanings.sent5: The fearless surfer windsurfed through the storm, defying the powerful waves.
